content: Note to any company pushing their left wing agenda, 53% of white women voted for Donald Trump. I know you live in a liberalbubble, and it’s very hard for you to understand that people have political views outside of your’s, but if you don’t want to alienate 53% of white women in this country, which are potential or current customers, stick to your product and not politics. It’s bad business. I know it’s really popular right now to say “Women kick-ass” and “Girl-Power” but in reality you come off as immature and give off the vibe that women should think with their private parts and not with their brain. Were all a little tired of identity politics and telling people how to vote based on their skin color or gender.
